name: Adventurous journey! || A mobile & laptop friendly platformer
name_original: Adventurous journey! || A mobile & laptop friendly platformer
description:
This is my first platformer!

More than 405+ blocks are used in this platformer!!

I think it is laggy :)

Controls:

Use A,W,S,D keys and arrow keys for the movement of player

It is mobile friendly and laptop friendly too and i know that the levels are really easy but next you'll be having some difficult levels!

So,first of all you'll have some problems in wall jumping but there is no such thing like wall jumping!

When the player touches that browny thing(Wall) it automatically goes up on the green surface/ground.

Cool!

It's not a problem or glitch,It's difficulty for you!!

One more thing: That thing on which a heart,star is drawn is nothing in this website!

Thanks for playing!!

That's all

Have fun!
